thread.title: Love Island viewers plead with fans to save doctor Alex George from being kicked off the show - Devon Live

author: Abbie Bray
title: Love Island viewers plead with fans to save doctor Alex George from being kicked off the show - Devon Live
text:
News Love Island viewers plead with fans to save doctor Alex George from being kicked off the show "If Alex and Samira go tonight I'll be even more disappointed in the British public that I was after Brexit" Share Abbie Bray What's On Reporter 12:00, 15 JUN 2018 Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Get Daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email
Things are definitely hotting up on Love Island especially after last night's episode.
In a shock twist on Thursday night Eyal read out a text saying that each of the couples had to vote for the two couples that they thought were least compatible. Read More Love Island's Alex and Charlie could get dumped from villa after being voted 'least compatible'
The couples that receive the most votes risk being dumped from the island tomorrow.
Couples Samira and Alex and Hayley and Charlie were voted the least compatible by the other couples meaning they are are risk of being booted off the island. Read More Reason for Love Island star Niall Aslam's shock exit REVEALED
Viewers of the show will now get to vote who they think should leave the island and the news will be revealed on Friday night's show.
Love Island fans were quick to jump the former Exeter student's defence on Twitter pleading for the public to save him from being kicked off the show. Read More
